Module mesakit.graph.core
Package com.telenav.mesakit.graph.analytics.crawler

Class GraphCrawler

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.graph.analytics.crawler.GraphCrawler
public class GraphCrawler extends Object
Crawls a graph within a limited distance and maximum number of edges, returning a set of connected edges. A crawler can be re-used by calling crawl(Vertex) multiple times, but GraphCrawler is not thread safe and an instance may not be used by more than one thread.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
